pretty yarn or have a project done quickly size women s medium shoe size 7-9 materials 50g of sock yarn fingering weight approximately 200-220 yds yarn used gypsy girl creations fingering weight colorway winter solstice 2 us size 1 16 inch circular needles stitch marker tapestry needle measuring tape gauge 8sts and 12rows per inch in stockinette stitch terms k1 tbl knit one through the back loop k2tog knit two stitches together ssk slip first stitch as if to knit slip second stitch as if to purl place both stitch back on the left needle and knit both through the back loop this pattern is written to be knit on 2 circular needles however is easily adaptable to knitting on double pointed needles by seperating stitches evenly over 4 double points cast on 64 stitches using the stretchy cast on of your choice separate evenly onto 2 circular needles needle 1 and needle 2 and join to knit in the round knit 5 row of twisted rib twisted rib *k1 tbl p1* repeat to the end of the round repeat every row heel at the end of row 5 begin the heel flap the heel flap will be made from by working the stitches on needle 1 back and forth eye of partridge row 1 *slip 1 k1* repeat until the end of the row row 2 slip 1 purl remaining stitches row 3 slip 1 *slip one as if to knit k1* repeat until one stitch remains knit 1 row 4 slip 1 purl remaining stitches work these 4 row until heel flap measures 2 5 inches ending after a purl row turn heel row 1 slip 1 knit 18 ssk turn row 2 slip 1 purl 6 p2tog turn row 3 slip 1 knit 6 ssk turn repeat row 2 and 3 until all the heel stitches have been used up end having finished a knit row gusset pick up stitches on the right side of the heel flap knit across held instep stitches pick up stitches on the left side of the heel flap rearrange stitches so that the instep stitches are on needle 2 and the heel and gusset stitches are on needle 1 row 1 knit to within 3 stitches of the end of needle 1 k2tog k1 knit across the 32 instep stitches on needle 1 k1 ssk knit 15 pm this marker will mark the end of the round row 2 knit all stitches repeat these two row until 32 stitches remain on needle 1 foot continue knitting all stitches on every round until sock measures within
